caption.p: Dates of LASV emergence in Mastomys natalensis versus Homo sapiens living in ( a) Ekpoma (Nigeria) and ( b) Kenema (Sierra Leone). In both locations, the peak in humans shows the emergence of LASV earlier than the one in rodents. Peaks in humans include 58 sequences in Nigeria and 19 sequences in Sierra Leone. Peaks in rodents include 26 sequences in Nigeria and 10 in Sierra Leone (see Tables S2 and S3).
